description: This is a label that appears between two mutually exclusive search options, indicating that you may select one option 'OR' the other.

This is a label on a button that the user presses in order to choose a video, image, or audio file that will be searched for. The file itself is not uploaded, so 'upload' would be the wrong verb to use here. This action opens a file picker prompt.
This is a label on a button that the user presses in order to execute a search query.
Tooltip for button to remove any applied keyword search
